title: Project 1: Power Outage Analysis
description: Conducted exploratory data analysis and developed a Random Forest classifier to predict the causes of U.S. power outages, achieving 73% testing accuracy.

title: AI Art Interaction - HDSI Lab
description: Developed a facial recognition-based robotic flower using OpenCV and Raspberry Pi. Collaborated on a machine learning outreach project integrating robotics and AI.

title: Speech Emotion Recognition Classifier
description: Built a convolutional neural network (CNN) for classifying speech emotions, optimizing hyperparameters to achieve significant improvements in classification accuracy.

title: Dog or Cat? Image Classification
description: Developed a deep learning image classifier to distinguish between cats and dogs with 98% accuracy. Preprocessed data and optimized model performance using TensorFlow.

title: AI-Generated Artwork Exploration
description: Created AI models to generate abstract art based on various input parameters and datasets. Explored creative uses of GANs.

title: Robotic Hand Gesture Recognition
description: Developed a real-time hand gesture recognition system using OpenCV and TensorFlow to control a robotic hand.

title: Data Visualization for Climate Change Trends
description: Analyzed and visualized climate change data over the last century using interactive dashboards and geospatial plots.

title: Real-Time Object Detection System
description: Developed a real-time object detection system using YOLOv5, capable of recognizing and tracking multiple objects.

title: Blockchain Application for Supply Chain
description: Implemented a blockchain-based system to improve transparency and traceability in the supply chain of agricultural products.

title: Speech Emotion Recognition Classifier
description: Developed and optimized a neural network to classify emotions from speech data using PyTorch and audio feature extraction.

title: Personal Finance Tracker App
description: Built a mobile application to track and visualize personal finance habits, integrating secure user authentication and data storage.

title: Personal Finance Tracker App
description: Built a mobile application to track and visualize personal finance habits, integrating secure user authentication and data storage.
